gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 130, Kings 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Trail Blazers defeated the Kings, 130-113. Anfernee Simons recorded 29 points and five 3PM for the Trail Blazers, while Scoot Henderson added 17 points and a career-high 11 assists in the victory. DeAaron Fox (43 points, career-high seven 3PM) and Domantas Sabonis (season-high 34 points, 12 rebounds, five assists) combined for 77 points for the Kings in the losing effort. The Trail Blazers improve to 8-21 on the season, while the Kings fall to 17-12.
